attributes.action: David Cameron to retract resignation and lead his country through EU exit
attributes.background: David Cameron gave the people of his country the option to vote out of the EU. He should now respect the peoples choice and lead them through this exit.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister, including the Prime Minister, is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. It is a decision for the individual concerned. The UK Government or Parliament cannot stop a Minister resigning.
